scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const targets=['dist','node_modules','src-tauri/target','.codex_audit','tsconfig.tsbuildinfo']; for (const t of targets) { try { fs.rmSync(t,{recursive:true,force:true}); } catch {} } function walk(dir){ let ents=[]; try { ents=fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true}); } catch { return; } for (const ent of ents){ const p=path.join(dir,ent.name); if (ent.isDirectory()) walk(p); else if (ent.name === '.DS_Store') { try { fs.rmSync(p,{force:true}); } catch {} } } } walk('.')"
